Control Name: 4.4. Ensure that 'Advanced Data Security' on a SQL server is set to 'On'
Control Statement: SQL Server Advanced Data Security provides a new layer of security, which enables customers to detect and respond to potential threats as they occur by providing security alerts on anomalous activities.
